thread.title: People are claiming the new Peeps Oreos have some very gross side effects
thread.title_full: People are claiming the new Peeps Oreos have some very gross side effects

title: People are claiming the new Peeps Oreos have some very gross side effects
text:
Oreo's limited edition Easter flavor hit stores last month, and while the jury is still out on the festive cookie's taste, people have begun to raise concerns about some unsavory effects the treats have had on their bodies.
Read more...
